conversion_verification.notes: The 3D model presents a consistent axonometric projection with all mandatory structural elements present.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent structural translation. Walls have realistic thickness and corners are mathematically sound.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Highly faithful room adjacency. Minor discrepancies in garage door scale relative to plan, but room partitions match the 2D document exceptionally well.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement is accurate to the 2D labels (theatre sofa, kitchen island, study desks).

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering with clear distinguishing materials between wet areas and living spaces.

detected_errors.description: Minor variations in window pane subdivisions compared to 2D symbols.

summary: This is a mathematically rigorous and visually clear 3D conversion that maintains nearly perfect layout fidelity with the provided architectural floor plan.
